top.title: US halts all asylum claim decisions in wake of National Guard shooting
top.summary: The directive comes hours after President Trump said the US will pause migration from "third-world countries".

top.title: Zelensky's top adviser resigns after Ukrainian anti-corruption raid on his home
top.summary: Andriy Yermak, 54, has been the Ukrainian president's chief of staff throughout Russia's full-scale war.

top.title: Eight more arrested over fire in Hong Kong that killed at least 128 people
top.summary: Authorities say 89 bodies are unidentified and 79 people remain injured after Wednesday's blaze.

top.title: Barcelona distances itself from sponsor's cryptocurrency after backlash
top.summary: Experts say the deal may put fans at risk as the Catalan club tries to relieve its financial woes.

top.title: OBR calls in cyber expert over botched release of Budget analysis
top.summary: Rachel Reeves's statement was thrown into chaos after journalists were able to access the document early.

top.title: Nvidia plays down Google chip threat concerns
top.summary: The world's most valuable company said it was still "a generation ahead of the industry".
